sections.title: Win Attention Without Burning Cash
sections.subtitle: Design a scrappy marketing engine that compounds reach through content, community, and referrals

sections.title: What You'll Build
items: Content pillars mapped to each stage of the funnel
Referral and ambassador loop with simple incentives
Key metrics dashboard for weekly optimization

sections.title: Lead With Value
sections.content: Organic marketing thrives on consistency and helpfulness. Choose two primary channels where your audience already gathers—newsletters, LinkedIn groups, niche subreddits—and commit to delivering actionable insights every week.

points.title: Partner Collabs
points.description: Swap webinars, guest posts, or newsletter shoutouts with complementary brands.

points.title: User-Generated Content
points.description: Feature customer wins and tutorials to build trust while multiplying your reach.

points.title: Lifecycle Email
points.description: Automate onboarding, activation, and re-engagement emails to nurture leads without extra spend.

sections.title: Measure CAC Weekly
sections.content: Track cost per acquired customer (CAC). If CAC creeps above your payback target, pause campaigns and reallocate to higher performing channels.

sections.title: Budget Marketing Sprint
steps: Define your audience's top three pain points and phrases they use to describe them.
Choose two core channels and schedule 30 days of content across each.
Create a simple lead magnet (checklist, template, mini-course) and connect it to your email list.
Implement a referral reward (discount, exclusive content) and announce it to customers.
Build a lightweight analytics sheet logging impressions, clicks, sign-ups, and conversions.

sections.title: Repurpose Everything
sections.content: Turn one long-form article into social clips, quotes, and email snippets—maximize every minute you invest.
